item.title: Report X-2024041202
item.description:
Report X-2024041202

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-30T18:16:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-15
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WEARING PROPER PPE AND USING THE UPDATED DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS OBSERVED TO BE LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT OF WHITE POWDER. RESPONDER PROMPTLY AND SAFELY CLEANED UP THE POWDER AND TRANSPORTED THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER INVESTIGATION/PROCESSING.

item.title: Report E-2024040509
item.description:
Report E-2024040509

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-25T15:11:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING UNLOADING OPERATIONS, THE HIGH-LEVEL SENSOR ON FACILITY STORAGE TANK FAILED TO OPERATE CAUSING THE TANK TO OVERFLOW AND SPILL 5 GALLONS OF PRODUCT ONTO THE RUBBER CONTAINMENT MAT. OFFLOADING OPERATIONS WERE HAULTED. BALANCE OF LOAD MOVED TO SECODARY STORAGE TANK. OFFLOADING COMPLETED WITHOUT FURTHER INCIDENT. THE SPILL WAS CLEANED UP BY PLANT PERSONNELL.
